directions.step:
1. Mix together sugar and Lighter Bake. Mixture will be crumbly. 2. Add eggs & mix at low speed until blended. 3. Stir together flour, nutmeg & cinnamon, and add to sugar mixture, blending well.
4. Stir in apples & walnuts until all coated completely. 5. Dissolve baking soda in hot water and stir into batter. 6. Pour into greased & floured square baking dish and bake at 375 until a knife inserted near center comes out clean - approximately 35 - 45 minutes. Recipe By : Eloise Griesmeyer
